OddityDescription: Crystal that shatters easily but then instantly reforms
Egg-shaped metallic bauble that occasionally spins and speaks in a language no one knows
Aerosol can that sprays sparkling paint that hangs in the air
Device that emits a projection of a human face that changes expression depending on the direction in which it's looking
Unknown musical instrument that plays only soft, unpleasant sounds
Circular stone plate with a human face that occasionally changes expression or appears to speak (but has no voice)
Box with a tiny group of musicians in it who play when it is opened and look horrified when it is closed
Remote-controlled dragonfly with a tiny, handheld controller
Pants that fit perfectly and never seem to get dirty but are always chilly
Blob of clay that takes on various mysterious shapes when left alone
Crystal that hums
Necklace made of gears and other machine parts
Flute with buttons rather than holes so you can play music without blowing into it
Lightning bug in a glass globe
Plastic disk that displays ever-changing but meaningless symbols
Small rod that emits a voice saying the same thing in an unknown language every time a button is pushed
Glass plate that shows what seems to be a live image of the moon, but from a closer vantage
Comb that glows when used
Small square cage that puts whatever single creature is inside it into stasis
Plastic bottle containing a spray that cleans any stain and never runs out
Metallic device that creates one sheet of new paper each day
Pen that writes in invisible ink revealed only at a very low temperature
Tiny toy ornithopter made of a solid piece of material that seems indestructible
Fuzzy stuffed ravage bear that makes growling noises when you squeeze it
Goggles that tint everything green
Series of thin plastic cards that show all kinds of unknown creatures
Candle that never runs down
Bag of sixteen rubber balloons
Three silken gloves with six fingers each
Metallic jar that maintains the temperature of liquid inside indefinitely
Blue crystal that glows as bright as a candle when held
Small coin pouch that holds twice as much as it appears it should
Small wand-like device that keeps away normal insects in a 5-foot (1.5 m) radius
Unknown plastic device with lights that occasionally blink
Powerful magnifying glass
Bag that contains dice, each with a different number of sides
Small mirrored cube
Piece of extremely strong and thin cable 8 feet (2.5 m) long
Feathered hat that occasionally makes bird noises
Wooden rod that increases in length by about 1 inch (2.5 cm) a month
Brass device with nested circular plates that rotate and click
Cape that billows as if blown by the wind when worn, even in still air
Glass cube that shows what seems to be a live aerial view of an unknown, ruined city
Armband that tightens slightly when within 100 feet (30 m) of abhumans
Small jar of black paint that refills itself each day
Metallic mask that fits perfectly on your face and changes expression when you do
Five metallic plates that orbit around your head and display ever-changing, unknown symbols
Green glass sphere that floats next to you and whistles when you are angry
Metal canister that fills with 4 quarts (3.8 liters) of water at the same time each day
Metal and glass disk that, when pressed against flesh, instantly etches a tattoo of a black scorpion
Small mirror that shows someone other than you when you gaze into it
Canister that produces an extremely foul odor and a puff of dark red smoke when opened
Goggles that allow you to see perfectly through steam or smoke
Box that produces a 3-inch (7.5 cm) cube of a firm but gelatinous substance at the same time each day
Shirt that displays your muscles, bones, and internal organs when you wear it
Small leather case of cosmetics that never seem to run out
Amulet that, when worn, projects holographic images of fish swimming around you
Bracelet with a tiny bell charm that rings like a massive bell when intentionally rung
Metallic, pointed-toe boots designed to fit an aneen or a similar creature
Cup that instantly boils any liquid poured into it
Spectacles that project strange images on the lenses so the wearer sees things that are not there
Box of a dozen matchsticks that, when burned, release puffs of lingering smoke that take on the shapes of faces, creatures, or other things
Blanket that makes a pleasant, soft humming noise while covering a living creature
Semicircular device of metal and glass that projects a harmless, thin red beam up to 50 feet (15 m) when activated
Two 5-inch (12.7 cm) metal and glass disks that hover around your wrists
Six small, clear synth bags that can be sealed and are very durable
Glass orb that always drips perfumed water very slowly
Jar of sixteen seeds; when planted, each seed grows into a daffodil made of gold in six months
Rose made of nigh-indestructible glass
Octagon-shaped amulet that is black during the day and sky blue at night
Mummified fish with feathered wings in a wooden box
Two-headed animal fetus in a glass jar
Saddle sized for a very small animal, such as a squirrel or a small cat
Small rectangular device that makes a chirping sound at the same time each day
Pair of tiny metal rods that, when brought within 1 inch (2.5 cm) of each other, vibrate exactly fifteen minutes before the sun rises on any given day
Ceramic ring that makes you feel as though gentle hands are caressing your body
Bottle of twenty-four pills that make you vividly dream about your favorite memory when you next sleep
Cylinder that clears the air of smoke, foul smells, and the like in an enclosed room in one minute's time
A pair of small, floating cubes that keep a small, enclosed room at the temperature at which water freezes
Bracelet that renders you unable to reproduce while worn
Chair that can be stored in an extradimensional space when activated
Synth disk that will restore a rotten vegetable or piece of fruit
Cylinder that, if you speak through it, makes your voice sound wavering and strange
Scarf that appears to be made of silk but is virtually indestructible and cannot be dirtied or stained
Egg-shaped device that temporarily negates all odor within 3 feet (1 m)
Short metal rod that is insubstantial to all matter except the special synth glove that goes with it
Cube that, when activated, disappears for one minute and then reappears in the same spot
Wristband that buzzes when in complete darkness
Plate of glass that, when you view the night sky through it, reveals ten times as many stars
Ceramic pot that produces a tiny puff of colored smoke once every hour and a half
Hoop that sharpens any blade passed through it
Sphere that produces vigorous bubbles when placed in water
Tiny awl that inflicts no pain when it pierces flesh
Contact lenses that make your eyes seem completely white with no pupils
Silken string 3 feet (1 m) long that coils around whatever it touches
Large, clear synth bag that keeps food inside it fresh indefinitely
Stockings that are always warm
Single rubber glove that is extremely durable and resistant
Box filled with two dozen spherical magnets, each about the size of a pea
Pair of clear drinking glasses that change color depending on the contents
